entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
